Classification,   Sample,   ccp.api.general.Affiliation,   ccp.api.general.Citation,   ccp.api.general.Instrument,   ccp.api.general.Method,   memops.api.AccessControl,   memops.api.Implementation

Packages Importing ccp.api.lims.Protocol:

Experiment

Classes:

Class Description
AddStep Step for adding a certain amount of materiel.
CentrifugationStep Step for centrifugation.
FiltrationStep Step for filtration.
FlowStep Flow step.
ParameterDefinition The list of possible parameters associated with a protocol where the values are associated with an Experiment.
PressStep Press step.
Procedure A procedure is a list of steps that can be repeated.
Protocol The information on the protocol. A protocol is a series of procedures that contain steps.
ProtocolStore TopObject for Protocol package
RefInputSample An InputSampleDef is used to specify that an Experiment created from the parent Protocol should have an InputSample that accepts Samples belonging to the specified SampleCategory (any if InputSampleDef.sampleCategory is null).
RefOutputSample An OutputSampleDef is used to specify that an Experiment created from the parent Protocol should have an OutputSample that accepts Samples belonging to the specified SampleCategory (any if OutputSampleDef.sampleCategory is null).
SonicationStep The sonication step.
Step Description of a general step contained within a procedure during a certain time (duration).
TemperatureStep Temperature step.
WaitStep Step for waiting.

Data Obj Types:

Type Description
None

Data Types:

Type Description
FlowType The possible type of flow.
ParamDefType Parameter definition types for ParameterDefinition class. Type enumeration (Float, String, ...)
